page.title: 1050 years ago in Stickney.
page.content: We interviewed Mr.Pickering, who has lived in Stickney all his life.He was born in 1912 and started school in 1917, when he was five years old. Everybody had to leave school when they were fourteen years old.There were about 130 children in the school, aged 5-14 years.Now there are about 105 children in the school,because when children are 11 years old they go to secondary school.The children used to write on slates.Today in Stickney there are only 2 pubs,but 60 years ago there were 7 pubs.The church has not changed much at all,except that it did not used to have any electricity.Children had to go to sunday school,which was held at school,in the library.The vicar used to live in the Rectory next to the church, but this has now been made into an old peoples home.
